kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-09-11 18:02:10 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-09-11 18:02:10 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-09-11 18:02:10 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-09-11 18:02:11 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:264 - client-C867D1B2C0B1->4e0e93f6-9db3-4c25-90fd-a635e29e04d1: receive RaftClientReply:client-C867D1B2C0B1->4e0e93f6-9db3-4c25-90fd-a635e29e04d1@group-2D704156B347, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=1, commits[4e0e93f6-9db3-4c25-90fd-a635e29e04d1:c1] 2019-09-11 18:02:11 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:264 - client-C867D1B2C0B1->4e0e93f6-9db3-4c25-90fd-a635e29e04d1: receive RaftClientReply:client-C867D1B2C0B1->4e0e93f6-9db3-4c25-90fd-a635e29e04d1@group-2D704156B347, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=3, commits[4e0e93f6-9db3-4c25-90fd-a635e29e04d1:c4]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

Run And Return Rc And Output

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
